content: bring a little everlasting greenery into your life with kerri the sweetheart hoya this intermediate pattern is perfect for those looking for a valentine s day gift that is always in full bloom she s the ultimate low-maintenance sweetheart ready to add a splash of botanical charm to your windowsill or desk why settle for a bouquet that fades when you can stitch a love that stays evergreen **materials** this pattern uses the following medium weight beginner easy peasy yarn green dark brown red pink black 2 × 10mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round unless otherwise noted for best results complete with yarn over stitches rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain twisted single_crochet twsc back loop only blo fasten_off invisible fasten_off embroidery
